allow: Bash(SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE=local psql -h localhost -U sand_dollar_user -d sand_dollar -c "DELETE FROM transactions; DELETE FROM accounts; DELETE FROM plaid_items;")

Bash(SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE=local psql -h localhost -U sand_dollar_user -d sand_dollar -c "SELECT ''users'' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM users UNION ALL SELECT ''accounts'', COUNT(*) FROM accounts UNION ALL SELECT ''transactions'', COUNT(*) FROM transactions UNION ALL SELECT ''plaid_items'', COUNT(*) FROM plaid_items;")

Bash(SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE=local psql -h localhost -U sand_dollar_user -d sand_dollar -c "SELECT u.email, COUNT(a.id) as account_count, COUNT(p.id) as plaid_item_count, COUNT(t.id) as transaction_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN accounts a ON u.id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN plaid_items p ON u.id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN transactions t ON a.id = t.account_id WHERE u.id = 1 GROUP BY u.id, u.email;")

Bash(SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE=local psql -h localhost -U sand_dollar_user -d sand_dollar -c "SELECT category_top, category_sub, COUNT(*) as count, SUM(amount_cents) as total_cents FROM transactions GROUP BY category_top, category_sub ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 20;")

Bash(SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE=local psql -h localhost -U sand_dollar_user -d sand_dollar -c "SELECT MIN(date) as earliest_transaction, MAX(date) as latest_transaction, COUNT(*) as total_transactions FROM transactions;")

Bash(SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE=local psql -h localhost -U sand_dollar_user -d sand_dollar -c "SELECT DATE_TRUNC(''month'', date) as month, COUNT(*) as transaction_count, SUM(amount_cents) as total_cents FROM transactions GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC(''month'', date) ORDER BY month;")
Bash(SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE=local psql -h localhost -U sand_dollar_user -d sand_dollar -c "SELECT DISTINCT category_top FROM transactions LIMIT 10;")

Bash(SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE=local psql -h localhost -U sand_dollar_user -d sand_dollar -c "SELECT date, amount_cents, category_sub FROM transactions WHERE date >= ''2025-09-01'' AND date <= ''2025-09-20'' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 20;")

Bash(SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE=local psql -h localhost -U sand_dollar_user -d sand_dollar -c "SELECT 
  SUM(CASE WHEN amount_cents > 0 THEN amount_cents ELSE 0 END) as income_cents,
  SUM(CASE WHEN amount_cents < 0 THEN ABS(amount_cents) ELSE 0 END) as expense_cents,
  COUNT(*) as transaction_count
FROM transactions 
WHERE date >= ''2025-09-01'' AND date <= ''2025-09-20'';")
